instruction: Cite three reputable sources that support the given statement.
input: The use of plant-based foods in an effort to reduce environmental impacts is becoming increasingly popular.
output: According to the Massachusetts Institute of Technology’s Technology Review, “Plant-based foods are an appealing and effective way to reduce one’s environmental footprint.” The National Resource Defense Council also states, “Choosing more plant-based foods can have a significant environmental benefit.” Furthermore, a study conducted by The World Resources Institute in 2020 posits that “a shift in diets to include less meat and more plant-based foods can have a significant contribution to reducing global greenhouse gas emissions.”
